name: Chessy Heaven
ingredients: Mozzarella Cheese , Cheddar Cheese, Parmessan Cheese, Gouda Cheese, Hand-tossed artisan crust
description: Indulge in a heavenly combination of Mozzarella, Cheddar, Parmesan, and Gouda cheeses on our hand-tossed artisan crust.

name: Supreme Delight
ingredients: Mozzarella Cheese , Sliced Pepperoni, Fresh Mushrooms, Olive, Crisp bell peppers, Sliced Onions, Rich marinara sauce, Hand-tossed artisan crust
description: Experience the ultimate delight with a combination of sliced pepperoni, fresh mushrooms, olives, crisp bell peppers, and sliced onions on a bed of rich marinara sauce atop our hand-tossed artisan crust.

name: Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, Ground beef, Tomato sauce, Ricotta cheese, Mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, Onion, Garlic, Italian seasoning, Salt, Pepper
description: Indulge in layers of flavorful lasagna noodles, seasoned ground beef, rich tomato sauce, creamy ricotta cheese, melted mozzarella cheese, and grated Parmesan cheese, infused with the savory aroma of onion, garlic, and Italian seasoning.

name: Spaghetti With Marinara Sauce
ingredients: Spaghetti pasta, Marinara sauce, Ground beef, Onion, Garlic, Olive oil, Italian seasoning, Salt, Pepper
description: Enjoy a hearty plate of al dente spaghetti pasta generously topped with savory marinara sauce, perfectly seasoned ground beef, saut√©ed onion, and garlic, drizzled with olive oil and sprinkled with Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.

name: Classic Hummus with Pita Bread
ingredients: Chickpeas, Tahini, Lemon juice, Garlic, Olive oil, Salt, Pita bread
description: Indulge in a delightful appetizer featuring creamy and smooth classic hummus made from blended chickpeas, tahini, fresh lemon juice, and garlic, drizzled with olive oil and served with warm and soft pita bread.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground beef, Taco seasoning, Tortillas, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese, Salsa, Sour cream
description: Savor the irresistible flavors of seasoned ground beef served in soft tortillas, topped with fresh lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, zesty salsa, and a dollop of creamy sour cream.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Grilled chicken breast, Parmesan cheese, Croutons, Caesar dressing
description: Indulge in the classic combination of crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, shaved Parmesan cheese, crunchy croutons, and tangy Caesar dressing.

name: Herb Lemon Salad
description: A vibrant salad bursting with fresh herbs and zesty lemon dressing.
ingredients: Mixed greens, parsley, cilantro, dill, mint, lemon zest, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper

name: Succulent Roast Beef
description: Tender slices of slow-roasted beef served with savory gravy.
ingredients: Beef roast, Salt, Pepper, Garlic, Onion, Beef broth, Flour

name: Grilled Tuna Steak
description: Delicious tuna steak seasoned with herbs and spices, grilled to perfection.
ingredients: Tuna steak, Olive oil, Lemon juice, Garlic, Salt, Pepper, Herbs

name: Chicken Fried Steak
description: Tender steak coated in seasoned flour, fried until golden brown, and served with creamy gravy.
ingredients: Beef steak, Flour, Eggs, Milk, Salt, Pepper, Seasonings, Oil for frying

name: Steamed Fish
description: Fresh fish fillet delicately seasoned and steamed to perfection, served with a side of vegetables.
